WorldOfWarcraft.name: Thrall
WorldOfWarcraft.description: Former Warchief of the Horde, Thrall is a skilled shaman and a key figure in the history of Azeroth.

WorldOfWarcraft.name: Jaina Proudmoore
WorldOfWarcraft.description: Jaina Proudmoore is a powerful mage and diplomat, playing a crucial role in Azeroth's alliances.

WorldOfWarcraft.name: Varian Wrynn
WorldOfWarcraft.description: Varian Wrynn, the High King of the Alliance, is a skilled warrior and a central figure in the Alliance-Horde conflict.

KingdomHearts.name: Sora
KingdomHearts.description: Sora is the main protagonist of Kingdom Hearts, wielding the Keyblade to combat darkness and protect his friends.

KingdomHearts.name: Donald Duck
KingdomHearts.description: Donald Duck, a loyal friend to Sora, provides magical support in battles against Heartless and other foes.

KingdomHearts.name: Goofy
KingdomHearts.description: Goofy, a trustworthy and humorous companion, fights alongside Sora and Donald in their quest to save the worlds.

PokemonYellow.name: Pikachu
PokemonYellow.description: Pikachu, an Electric-type Pokémon, is the loyal companion of the Pokémon Trainer on their journey.

PokemonYellow.name: Charizard
PokemonYellow.description: Charizard, a powerful Fire and Flying-type Pokémon, evolves from Charmeleon and is known for its fiery attacks.
